Benthos

Sep 17, 2020 â€¢ Christoph Kappel

Sometimes you discover tools, that sound really awesome, but still after a while of thinking, you cannot find a good use for it.

Let me introduce you to Benthos, a tool to basically knit an input to an output, optionally with one or many plug-able content processor.

From my understanding, it behaves like a pipe, just for everything that can have and/or consume any content.

To be continued.
